contexts.context: ...today we’re publishing a new weekly newspaper called "The <mark>Geniune</mark> Jew" Our Newspaper is made for the Jewish people...
...written by another class of writers, and “The <mark>Geniune</mark> Jew” on the other hand will be in another...
..., who hopefully will understand the value of the <mark>“Geniune</mark> Jew”. Lviv,Y. L. L.
